name: RenderThermalPrintResult
description: Renders the result of a previous thermal print job to HTML and/or PDF.

properties.name: BlobID
properties.description: The blob that contains the result of the thermal print job. If an incorrect blob is specified, an error will be returned.

properties.name: OutputFormat
properties.description: The output format. It's possible to provide both HTML and PDF. When Html is specified the response will contain the thermal print result inside the `Html` field.
